config.insight.title: Insight Settings
config.insight.itemTooltips.enabled.tool: Show 3D tooltips above dropped items in the world
config.insight.itemTooltips.detectionMod:
AREA: Shows tooltips for all nearby items
CROSSHAIR: Shows tooltip only for the item your looking at
Maximum number of item tooltips to display at once
config.insight.itemTooltips.filterCommon: Hide tooltips for specific items, Defaults to common items like cobblestone, dirt, logs, etc
config.insight.itemTooltips.filteredItem: List of item IDs to hide (e.g minecraft:cobblestone)
config.insight.targetHud.enabled.tooltip: Show health bar and info above entities your looking at
config.insight.targetHud.smartPositionin: Dynamically positions the HUD for optimal visibility based on your view angle
config.insight.misc.bedTimer.tooltip: Shows time until night when looking at a bed
config.insight.misc.cropGrowth.tooltip: Shows growth progress when looking at crops
